actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the juvenile accountability block grants program through fiscal year 2015.
short_title: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2012

summary.text: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2012 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend through FY2015 the authorization of appropriations for the juvenile accountability block grant program.

titles.title: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2012
To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the juvenile accountability block grants program through fiscal year 2015.
